item.title: CVE-2018-3836|2024-08-05T04:57:24.110Z -- dan%20bloomberg -- leptonica
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the gplotMakeOutput function of Leptonica 1.74.4. A specially crafted gplot rootname argument can cause a command injection resulting in arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious path as input to an application that passes attacker data to this function to trigger this vulnerability.
